wikipedia_page.main: Edward Hamlyn Adams (middle name also given as Hamlin (1777–1842) was a Jamaican merchant. In later life, he settled in Wales, and served as Member of Parliament for Carmarthenshire.

response: Eugene Lee-Hamilton was born in London on 6 January 1845; his parents were James Lee-Hamilton, who died in 1852, and Matilda Abadam (1815–1896), daughter of Edward Hamlyn Adams.
*Edward Hamlyn Adams (1777–1842), British Member of Parliament for Carmarthenshire
